summary:
# Dreammode Enhancement Review - February 20, 2026

## Current System Status

### Active Enhancements

**Pattern Learning:**
- Status: Implemented but no data collected yet
- The system is tracking but has received ZERO user feedback
- All pattern counters (configurations, preferences, decisions, etc.) at 0
- No user feedback history recorded
- Root cause: Morning debriefs are sent but user hasn't been providing keep/delete feedback

**Task Continuity:**
- Status: Listed as active, but no evidence of tracking
- No data showing incomplete tasks or follow-up items being captured
- Unclear if this is actually working or just conceptually planned

### Phase 1: Categorized Memory System ✅ WORKING

**What's Working Well:**
- File structure created and organized
- Index.md provides good navigation
- All content migrated from single MEMORY.md
- Build documentation exists for backup/restore
- Morning debriefs are being sent daily (19 items extracted on Feb 19)

**Issues Noticed:**
- Feb 18th was the only daily log processed
- Feb 19th daily log doesn't exist
- Night phase cron jobs show "error: cron announce delivery failed" (but this is expected for silent jobs)
- Pattern learning file exists but is empty

## Assessment

The core system works, but the "active" enhancements (Pattern Learning, Task Continuity) are not functioning yet because they require user feedback that isn't happening. The morning debriefs are sent, but the user isn't reviewing and providing keep/delete decisions.

This creates a chicken-and-egg problem:
- Pattern Learning needs user feedback to learn
- User won't provide feedback if the debriefs aren't compelling
- Task Continuity can't track what's not being discussed

## Recommendations

### Priority 1: Implement Phase 2 - Enhanced Morning Debrief

**Why:** This addresses the core issue - the user has NO visibility into what will be written. Phase 1 shows extracted items but doesn't reveal:
- Which file each item will go to
- Exact content that will be…
